description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has used PowerShell including for remote system discovery.(Citation: Microsoft Volt Typhoon May 2023)(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023)(Citation: CISA AA24-038A PRC Critical Infrastructure February 2024)

external_references.description: CISA et al.. (2024, February 7). PRC State-Sponsored Actors Compromise and Maintain Persistent Access to U.S. Critical Infrastructure. Retrieved May 15, 2024.
